title: Two Bedroom Townhome For Rent
posting_body: It has one and a half baths, full kitchen, washer and dryer hook up.
Walk to downtown Gainesville, Ga. to shopping, dining, and entertainment.
Ivy Terrace Park is right behind the property with a nature trail, picnic pavilion, and swings for the kids.
Take a walk or ride your bike.
RENT: $950.00 PER MONTH  WATER AND TRASH $18.00 PER MONTH ($968)
For more information go to <URL> and click on Ivy Manor Townhomes
